api_list.name: gETv1status
api_list.description: Returns the remaining requests for the given API key.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zipcodestack-free-zip-code-api.p.rapidapi.com/v1/status"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zipcodestack-free-zip-code-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://zipcodestack-free-zip-code-api.p.rapidapi.com/v1/status"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zipcodestack-free-zip-code-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: gETv1search
api_list.description: Search zip codes with this endpoint

required_parameters.name: codes
required_parameters.description: string Comma-separated list of zip codes.

api_list.name: gETv1distance
api_list.description: Calculates the distance between one and other postalcodes

required_parameters.name: compare
required_parameters.description: string The list of zip codes to compare to.

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit of distance, can be kilometers or miles. Defaults to km.
